<!--- DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE. IT IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED. -->


Computes the base 10 logarithm of the number.



```
log10(num: number) -> number
```

### Examples

```kcl
const myVar = log10(4)
```

### Arguments

* `num`: `number` (REQUIRED)

### Returns

`number`
